title: Rime drake
data:

{{monster info}}

==Useful Info==
'''Rime drakes''' are one of the weaker [[list of dragons#Lesser Dragons|lesser dragons]], but they are still capable of irritating and injuring adventurers. They are usually found in [[the Lair]], and can be created by monsters with the [[Summon Drakes]] spell.

{{monster spells}}

==Tips & Tricks==
* Their [[Flash Freeze]] breath deals significant damage, ignores [[EV]], and applies Frozen, slowing movement speed. [[Cold resistance]] is helpful. Fortunately, they cannot spam Flash Freeze: this spell cannot affect creatures that are Frozen.
* They are fast, but have low AC, a moderate amount of EV and low willpower. Try to take them out quickly.

==History==
*Rime drakes were added in [[0.18]].
